title: Warehouse Watcher
description: A warehouse monitoring system built with a microservices architecture. Python backend services interact with a Vue.js front end to monitor the warehouse environment.

features.title: Login
features.description: Firebase login setup for secure entry. Deployed with Vercel

features.title: Simulator
features.description: Control the MQTT output from python Eclipse Paho sensors, another python subscriber stores this data in InfluxDB.

features.title: 3D Scene
features.description: View the warehouse sensors in real-time. View inventory data synced with Odoo.

features.title: Admin
features.description: Controls the alert thresholds for environmental sensors.

features.title: Dashboard
features.description: Grafana integrated dashboard view with a Admin thresholds automatically updated.

features.title: Report
features.description: Produces PDF/CSV/EXCEL report files for sensor data over a specified time.
